alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Marion; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 12:57PM CDT until May 13 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Polk County in central Iowa... Northwestern Marion County in south central Iowa... Southwestern Jasper County in central Iowa... Northeastern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ackworth, or 6 miles east of Indianola, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sandyville around 105 PM CDT. Hartford around 110 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pleasantville, Runnells, Swan and Lake Red Rock. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and south central Iowa.
